title: Public Safety, Healthcare & Business Dashboards (Power BI)
summary: Collection of Power BI reports analyzing police shootings, diabetes/health patterns, wine wholesaler profitability, and environmental data. Demonstrates ability to model diverse datasets.
process: Cleaned, joined, and shaped datasets from multiple domains (public safety, health, retail)
Designed semantic models with calculated tables, relationships, and DAX measures
Added KPIs for revenue, health indicators, and demographic segmentation
Integrated R visuals to explore correlations and trends not visible in basic charts
Created drill-through and tooltip pages for detailed data exploration
Applied BI best practices in dimensional modeling, layout, and performance optimization
impact: Uncovered actionable insights across business, healthcare, and societal datasets
Demonstrated ability to handle messy, real-world data and derive meaningful indicators
Showed strong competency in DAX, modeling, and cross-domain analytics
